DOC.criteria: Male female adult age 18 35 ( inclusive ) Healthy determine medical history Nonsmoker , exsmoker ≥6 month Body mass index 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 Female participant childbearing potential ( i.e . surgically sterilize postmenopausal great one year ) must negative urine pregnancy test must use effective birth control method Willing avoid alcohol consumption 24 h prior every clinic visit Willing maintain stable body weight , activity level dietary pattern except use study product , direct Willing able provide inform write consent Individuals take prescription nonprescription health product may affect study endpoint ( e.g . corticosteroid , prescription antiinflammatory drug , blood lipidlowering drug ( e.g . statin , fibrates , bile acid exchanger resin , phytosterols , niacin analogue , carnitine , etc . ) previous 6 month Individuals take supplement omega3 fatty acid , phytosterols , polyglucosamines ( Chitosan ) lipidbinding ingredient previous 6 month Individuals consume omega3 fatty acid rich fish ( salmon , mackerel , herring ) twice per month Unstable use ( initiation change dose ) antihypertensive medication thyroid hormone replacement medication within 3 month prior visit 1 Use weightloss program weightloss medication ( prescription overthe counter ) include , limited , lipase inhibitor , within 6 month prior visit 1 throughout study Pregnancy lactation , participant unwilling take appropriate contraceptive duration study History blood clot disorder use coagulationinhibiting drug ( e.g . warfarin ) Presence major disease diabetes , gastrointestinal , endocrine , cardiovascular , renal , liver disease History neurological disease ( e.g . Parkinson 's disease , stroke , traumatic brain injury , etc . ) History cancer ( exclude nonmelanoma skin cancer basal cell carcinoma ) past 5 year Uncontrolled hypertension define seat rest systolic blood pressure ≥140 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure ≥90 mmHg Abnormal laboratory test result clinical significance , include , limited , ALT AST ≥1.5X upper limit normal screening ( visit 1 ) Triglycerides ≥400 mg/dL ( ≥4.52mmol/L ) screening ( visit 1 ) Presence history ( past 6 month ) alcohol drug abuse ; alcohol use > 2 standard alcoholic drink per day Participant know allergy intolerance fish/fish oil ingredient test product Participant vegan Participant unwilling unable abide requirement protocol Any condition would interfere participant 's ability comply study instruction , might confound interpretation study , put participant risk Participant take investigational medicine participate research study within 30 day prior first study visit
